name: The Sleepless Student: A Sleep Deprivation Game (Demo)
name_original: The Sleepless Student: A Sleep Deprivation Game (Demo)
description:
Dan is a college student who sometimes has trouble getting a good nights rest. Your choices will impact Dan's behavior and emotions...

Credits

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Art: Created by Elliott Kaplan in Adobe Illustator

Game Design: Developed by Elliott Kaplan in Unity
